resources.string: This app works with 2015 J Series Samsung SmartTVs.
Most J Series models are supported but here are the recommended model series.
Welcome! please choose a device to connect.
View photos from your mobile device on a 2015 Samsung Smart TV.
Make sure your TV and mobile device are on the same WiFi network.
View photos from your mobile device on a 2015 Samsung Smart Tv.
1. You need a compatible Samsung 2015 Smart TV.
2. Your mobile device and TV must be on the same WiFi network.
3. When your mobile device discovers a TV,\u0020\u0020 will appear on the top right corner of screen.
4. Tap \u0020\u0020\u0020 to select the tv you wish to use.
5. When \u0020\u0020\u0020 turns to \u0020\u0020, you are connected.
Tap \u0020\u0020\u0020 to disconnect or switch to another TV.
Do you want more information about the Multiscreen SDK?
We\'d be happy to answer all your questions.
Could not send photo to TV. Try again later.
Loading photo failed. Photo format may not be supported on this phone.
